mapper.select: select ssa.*, ssav.id vid, ssav.sale_attr_value_name from spu_sale_attr ssa left join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id where ssa.spu_id = #{spuId} order by ssa.id,ssav.id

select ssa.*, ssav.id vid, ssav.sale_attr_value_name, IF(skuv.sale_attr_value_id IS NULL,'0','1') as is_checked from spu_sale_attr ssa left join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.base_sale_attr_id=ssav.base_sale_attr_id left join sku_sale_attr_value skuv on ssav.id = skuv.sale_attr_value_id and skuv.sku_id=#{skuId} where ssa.spu_id=#{spuId} order by ssa.base_sale_attr_id,ssav.id

select a.sku_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sale_attr_value_id ORDER BY sale_attr_value_id ASC SEPARATOR '|') as value_json from (select si.id sku_id, skuav.id vid, skuav.spu_id, skuav.sale_attr_value_id, ssav.base_sale_attr_id from sku_info si left join sku_sale_attr_value skuav on si.id = skuav.sku_id left join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on skuav.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id WHERE si.spu_id=#{spuId} ORDER BY si.id,ssav.base_sale_attr_id,skuav.sale_attr_value_id) a GROUP BY a.sku_id
